name: Long Barrel Curling Iron 0.75”
about: What it is:An award-winning curling iron that’s two inches longer than an average one, allowing you to curl the back of your hair with ease..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Curl Enhancing.Key Benefits:- Features a Nanolonic ™, mineral-infused barrel.What Else You Need to Know:Founded by a hair stylist, Bio Ionic is the professional’s choice for styling tools. Advanced, natural ionic technology provides speedy results and healthy, hydrated hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It so good I have had mine over 7year and to this day it is so good the curls are gorgeous every single things a amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this curling iron... for three months before it completely stopped working. It either won't turn on at all or will turn on, the light blinks a few times and then shuts off.   It's a total shame because the long barrel is great, it heats up super fast and creates beautiful curls that last a long time, and my hair does not hold curls easily. But it's a total waste of money, the warranty is not good, I have bought 2 Bio Ionic curling irons, both had the same issue, and the 2nd one stopped working just shortly after the warranty was up.
